letter.name: Debt Verification Letter
letter.content:
{{LETTER_HEAD}}
{{DATE}}
{{HOMEOWNER_MAILING}}
Property: {{HOMEOWNER_RESIDENCE}}
Re: {{LETTER_TOPIC}}
Dear {{HOMEOWNER_NAME}},

The Association's management company has been employed to collect the debt referenced below and all information obtained will be used for that purpose.

According to our records, you are now thirty days or more delinquent in the payment of the Assessments owed to {{ORG_NAME}}. The total due, as of today, is {{BUDGET_DUE}}.

Attached, please find your account history. This will serve as verification of your account balance. If payment on this account is not received within thirty (30) days, your account will be turned over to the Association's attorney for collection. All attorney charges and costs related to collection will be charged to you.

{{LETTER_SIGNATURE}}
{{LETTER_APPROVER}}
{{LETTER_PERSON}}
{{LETTER_FOOTER}}
